00020 #ifndef RDK2_RGRAPHICS_COLOR
00021 #define RDK2_RGRAPHICS_COLOR
00022 
00023 #include <stdint.h>
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00026 
00027 typedef uint32_t RgbColor ;
00028 
00029 const RgbColor  RGB_BLACK   = 0x00000000;
00030 const RgbColor  RGB_WHITE   = 0x00ffffff;
00031 const RgbColor  RGB_RED     = 0x00ff0000;
00032 const RgbColor  RGB_GREEN   = 0x0000ff00;
00033 const RgbColor  RGB_BLUE    = 0x000000ff;
00034 const RgbColor  RGB_YELLOW  = 0x00ffff00;
00035 const RgbColor  RGB_MAGENTA = 0x00ff00ff;
00036 const RgbColor  RGB_CYAN    = 0x0000ffff;
00037 const RgbColor  RGB_GRAY    = 0x00888888;
00038 const RgbColor  RGB_ORANGE  = 0x00ff8800;
00039 
00040 inline unsigned char rgbGetRed(RgbColor  c)   { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0xff0000) >> 16); }
00041 inline unsigned char rgbGetGreen(RgbColor  c) { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0x00ff00) >> 8); }
00042 inline unsigned char rgbGetBlue(RgbColor  c)  { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0x0000ff)); }
00043 
00044 inline RgbColor rgb(uint8_t red, uint8_t green, uint8_t blue) { return (((uint32_t) red) << 16) + (((uint32_t) green) << 8) + blue; }
00045
